description: President Trump has denied man-made climate change. The Times’s Nicholas Kristof travels to drought-stricken Madagascar to see the unfolding crisis for himself.
title: What We Saw in Madagascar
title_page: What We Saw in Madagascar - Video - NYTimes.com
text: President Trump has denied man-made climate change. The Times’s Nicholas Kristof travels to drought-stricken Madagascar to see the unfolding crisis for himself.
